about.title: About Me
about.content: Java Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable applications using Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, and RESTful APIs within microservices-based architectures. Skilled in developing responsive front-end interfaces with Angular and React, supported by robust backend services and optimized database design using PostgreSQL. Experienced in CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins. Created conversational chatbots using Azure Bot Service and integrated Python Djangoâ€“based chatbots with TensorFlow and Keras LLM models.
